RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 23300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE IN 2022 - 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $25,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 13, 2023 A llowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SQUID gained command quickly from the under good handling stayed well clear each pole to win off easily to the wire. CATABOUT raced back to the turn, took up chase into the stretch while no match for the winner but clearly best of the rest. PENNY SHOTS pinched from the gate. stumbled badly after the start, trailed far back but passed one in the stretch. LATE DATE bore in at the start bothering rival and never factored throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Catabout
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back to the turn, took up chase into the stretch no match

ENTRY.NAME: Squid
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained command quickly, stayed well clear each pole, easily

ENTRY.NAME: Penny Shots
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly after the start, far back but passed one stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Late Date
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in start bothering rival, never factored throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 13, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferre d).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZIP IT SCOTTY had an awkward start, inside run to turn, shuffled to quarter pole inside to the quarter pole ran off late. ZERO TO ONEHUNDRED sharp to the front battled determinedly with winner, no match. SUGGESTED unhurried early, split horses to the turn and ran on outside for show spot. LITTLE ALEX raced a wide trip to the turn while outside through the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Zip It Scotty
ENTRY.OWNER: Jazdzewski Patience Jazdzewski Jon Dyster Mark and Haines Carl
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, inside run to turn, shuffled to 1/4p, ran off late

ENTRY.NAME: Suggested
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, split horses to turn, ran on outside for show

ENTRY.NAME: Little Alex
ENTRY.OWNER: Lopez - Martinez Yulian Erika and Torres Marcelino
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced a wide trip to the turn while outside in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Zero to Onehundred
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the front battled determinedly with winner, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 71. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 123 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 13, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCK THE NILE had an awkward from the gate, raced between horses to stretch, split horses and cleared off with a good effort. LANALIKESCHOOCHOOS hustled along to the front, cleared to the turn while no match for winner in the final furlong. SOMEBODYLOVESYOU had an awkward start from the gate, could not keep to the turn but passed one in the stretch run. FOR THE BISCUIT staggered badly from the gate, hustled along to chase while used up and dropped back readily from the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: For the Biscuit
ENTRY.OWNER: Spadone Emil John and Stephenson Kate
ENTRY.COMMENT: staggered badly from the gate, hustled along to chase, used up

ENTRY.NAME: Somebodylovesyou
ENTRY.OWNER: Snowden, Steve, Arnold, Douglas S. and Reed, Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from the gate, could not keep up to the turn, passed one

ENTRY.NAME: Rock the Nile
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from the gate, between horses to str, split horses clear

ENTRY.NAME: Lanalikeschoochoos
ENTRY.OWNER: Flower City Racing LLC and Meyer Christopher J
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along to the front, cleared to turn, no match for winner

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 13, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pref erred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DAWN WEST no speed to the backstretch, raced four wide to the far turn, battled aggressively from the quarter pole to the finish in a game effort to prevail at the wire. ELIZA'S HONOR raced between horses to far turn, dueled into the stretch from the rail but outgamed to the wire in a solid effort. SUBURBAN PRINCE inside pace to the half, continued on evenly for the show spot. MODUS three wide between horses to far turn but, gave way readily through the stretch run.ATFER A RIDERS CLAIM OF FOUL CONCERNING THE WINNER AND SECOND PLACE FINISHER FOR INTERFERENCE FROM THE TURN AND THROUGH THE STRETCH, THE STEWARDS TOOK NO ACTION AND ORDER OF FINSH WAS NOT CHANGED.

ENTRY.NAME: Suburban Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Wonderland Racing Stables LLC Davis Mark and Leatherman Ty
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pace to the half, continued on evenly for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Dawn West
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to backstretch, four wide to far turn, battled hard game

ENTRY.NAME: Modus
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide between horses to far turn, gave way readily stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Eliza's Honor
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to far turn, dueled into stretch, outgamed to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOU GOTTA HAVE FUN (IRE) just off leader early on, took over with authority to go clear in the final sixteenth. GAMBI good position never far back to the stretch, rallied, second best. CONURE inside trip throughout while grinding along for show spot. AUGURI quick inside speed to the front, overtaken turn, gave in readily. LAYAWAY hopped at the start, never menaced throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Auguri
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick inside speed to the front, overtaken turn, gave in readily

ENTRY.NAME: Conure
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip throughout while grinding along for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Layaway
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped at the start, never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: You Gotta Have Fun (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leader early on, took over with authority to go clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: R J B Bloodstock & Lynch Bages Ltd

ENTRY.NAME: Gambi
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back to the stretch, rallied, second best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEVILS RED bore in at the start, cleared off to the turn while lugging in through the stretch run. LIAMS LAD bothered at the start,regrouped from inside, stayed game through the stretch run. CARTOON CAPER bothered at the start, rushed to front, brief lead between calls in the stretch while shut off between horses in the late going and faded back for show spot. BENITO bothered start, dropped far back throughout. BOOSTERIZED bothered at the start, dropped far back quickly. The Stewards posted the Inquiry Sign following the finish, after a review of the race there was no action taken and the race was made official.

ENTRY.NAME: Benito
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered start, dropped far back throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Boosterized
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered at the start, dropped far back quickly

ENTRY.NAME: Liams Lad
ENTRY.OWNER: Thornton Timothy C Cloonan Michael P and Heyward Nicholas
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered at the start,regrouped from inside, stayed game stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Cartoon Caper
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered start, rushed to front, led in stretch, shut off, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Devils Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in start, cleared quickly, lugged in stretch run, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 13, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio R egistered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: C'MON MAN bobbled at the start, lagged back to the turn, rallied late, cleared. CHROMED IMPULSE sprinted to the front, stayed to deep stretch wore down late. HUNTERTOWN had an awkward start,raced close up, battled on determinedly. UNCLEJACKOMO raced along evenly from inside, never a real menace. POUR ME A DOUBLE tried to keep up to the turn, faded in the stretch run. CINDY'S STORM brief speed, gaved in readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Huntertown
ENTRY.COMMENT: had an awkward start,raced close up, battled on determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Chromed Impulse
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted to the front, stayed to deep stretch wore down late

ENTRY.NAME: Unclejackomo
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from inside, never a real menace

ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled at the start, lagged back to the turn, rallied late clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 13, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 13, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 O r Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLEVER TALE chased leader to deep stretch, roused final furlong, cleared off in the final sixteenth. LUCKY US speed to the front, led to deep stretch, no match in late going. JOYFUL NOISE raced along evenly from outside with no late kick, settled for show spot. OUT ATTHE SPEEDWAY faded back quickly and never reached contention. SHEZA FINE JUSTICE through early, dropped back readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Us
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, led to deep stretch, no match in late going

ENTRY.NAME: Clever Tale
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to deep stretch, roused final furlong, cleared off

ENTRY.NAME: Out Atthe Speedway
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded back quickly while never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Fine Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, dropped back readily

ENTRY.NAME: Joyful Noise
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
